wikipedia_page.main: General Sir Arthur Augustus Thurlow Cunynghame   (3 August 1812 – 10 March 1884) was a British Army commander and memoirist. Cunynghame was colonel-commandant of the King's Royal Rifle Corps and of the 36th Regiment of Foot.

response: *Hon. Frances Elizabeth Hardinge (d. 9 July 1894) married Gen. Sir Arthur Cunynghame, son of Sir David Cunynghame, 5th Baronet. They had two sons, and three daughters.
* Arthur Cunynghame (1812–1884), British Army officer and memoirist
